gurmukhi: qau hI lau AYso sunI bqIXw lCIAw giH mY suq pMf ky Awey ] gwie smyq sBo imil kOrn icMq ibKY krunw n bswey ]
transliteration: Tau Hi Lau Aiso Sounibateeyaa Lachheeaa Grah(i) Mai Sout Pand Ke Aae|| Gade Smet Sabho Mil(i) Kauran Chitt Bikhai Karounaa Na Basaae||
translation: Hearing all these things till that time, the Pandavas came to the House of Wax; they all requested the Kauravas together, but the Kaurvas did not have the slight element of mercy;

gurmukhi: AYso ibcwr kIXo icq mY su qhwN ko clY sB ibSn bulwey ] AYsy ibcwr su swj kY sXMdn sRI biRjnwQ qhw ko isDwey ]2066]
transliteration: Aiso Bichaar Keeye Chit Mai Su Tahaan Ko Chalai Sabh Bishan Bulaae|| Aise Bichaar Su Saaj Kai Syandan Sribrijnaath Tahaa Ko Sidhaae||2066||
translation: After great reflection, they called Krishna, who, after bedecking his chariot started for that place.2066.

gurmukhi: kwnH cly auq kau jbhI brmwkiRq qo ieq mMqR ibcwrXo ] lY AkrUr kau Awpny sMig khXo Ary kwnH kau pDwrXo ]
transliteration: Kaahn Chale Out Kau Jab-hibarmaakrit To It Mantra Bichdaryo|| Lai Akroor Kau Aapane San(i) Kahyo Ar Kaahn Kau Padhdaryo||
translation: When Krishna started going towards that place, then Kratvarma thought of something and taking Akrur with him, he asked him, “Where Krishna has gone?”

gurmukhi: CIn lY Xw qy Ary imil kY min AYsy ibcwir kIXo iqh mwrXo ] lY brmwkiRq vw bD kY mn Awpny Dwm kI Er isDwrXo ]2067]
transliteration: Chheen Lai Yaa Tedare Mil(i) Kai Man(i) Aise Bcdaar(i) Keeyo Tih Mdaryo|| Lai Barmaakrit Vaa Badh Kai Man Aapane Dhaam Kior Sidhdaryo||2067||
translation: Come, let us snatch away the jewel from Satrajit and thinking like this, they killed Satrajit; after killing him Kratvarma went to his home.2067.

gurmukhi: siq DMnw BI sMg clwXo ] jb sqRwijq ko iqn GwXo ] ey iqn bD kY fyrn Awey ] auqY sMdyS sXwm sun pwey ]2068]
transliteration: Sat(i) Dhannaa Bhisan Chalaayo|| Jab Satraajit Ko Tin Ghaayo|| E Tin Badh Kai Deran Aae|| Outai Sandesh Syaam Soun Paae||2068||
translation: When they killed Satrajit, Shatdhanva with them; on this side, all the three cam to their homes and on that side, Krishna came to know about it.2068.
Speech of the messenger addressed to Krishna:

gurmukhi: pRB so dUqn bYn aucwry ] sqRwijq kiRqbrmw mwry ] min Dn CIn qwih qy lXo ] qoih qRIAw ko Aiq duKu dXo ]2069]
transliteration: Prabh So Dootan Bain Ouchdare|| Satraajit Kritharmaa Mdare|| Man(i) Dhan Chheen Taah(i) Te Layo|| Toh(i) Treeaa Ko At(i) Doukh(u) Dayo||2069||
translation: The messenger said to the Lord, “Kratvarma has killed Satrajit; he has snatched away the jewel from him and in this way he has inflicted great suffering on your wife Satyabhama.”2069.

gurmukhi: jb jdupiq ieh ibD sun pwXo ] Cor Aaur sB kwrj AwXo ] hir Awvn kiRqbrmY jwnI ] siqDMnw so bwq bKwnI ]2070]
transliteration: Jab Jadoupat(i) Eh Bidh Soun Paayo|| Chhodh Aur Sabh Kaaraj Aayo|| Har(i) Aavan Kritbarmai Jaanee|| Sat(i)dhannaa So Baat Bakhaanee||2070||
translation: When Krishna heard this, he came to their side, leaving all other engagements; when Kratvarma learnt about the coming of Krishna, he said to Shatdhanva;2070.

gurmukhi: khu siqDMnw bwq AbY hm krY ] kho prY kY jwie kho lir kY mrY ]
transliteration: Kahu Sat(i)dhannaa Baat Abai Ham Kiaa Darai|| Kaho Darai Kai Jaae Kaho Lar(i) Kai Darai||
translation: “O Shatdhavana! What should we do now? If you say, we shall run away or shall die fighting;

gurmukhi: duie mY iek muih bwq kho smJwie kY ] ho ko aupwie kY sXwmih mwrY jwie kY ]2071]
transliteration: Due Mai Ik Muhe Baat Kaho Samjhaae Kai|| Ho Ko Oupaae Kai Syaamah(i) Mdarai Jaae Kai||2071||
translation: Advise and instruct me about one of them and tell me if there is any step, by which we can kill Krishna.2071.
